section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains attributes related to the original assignment of the flag only.

stentry.p: This is a text description of the incident or reason that generated the need for this patient record flag assignment, followed by the recommended actions that should be performed by a person working with this specific patient.
The date that the flag assignment is due for review to determine continuing appropriateness
Indicates if the patient record flag assignment is Active or Inactive for this Patient. Possible values are Inactive; Active etc.
Indicates the Patient Record Flag Name that is assigned to a patient. Possible values are behavioral; etc.
Internal entry number (IEN) which is assigned to each record of this file. [A unique identifier for the Act. (HL7 3.0)]
Indicates the site that initially assigned the patient record flag to this patient.
Indicates the current site that owns this patient flag assignment.
Patient who is the subject of this Patient Record Flag.
